column1: Some component within the data logger have recently been discontinued or are difficult to get. This list details any suggested substitutions.

column3: Pololu Adjustable Step-Up Voltage Regulator U1V11A
column5: The replacement regulator uses the same circuit board more or less you need to remove the same component mentioned in the instructions then apply power to the regulator, measure the output voltage and move the screw on the top until it gives you 5 volts across the output.
This is a drop in replacement with the same footprint on the PCB
